item.title: Gazoo - PMPVsHamburg
item.description: Another week and another weekend show. I"ll be there. Will you?I hope so. My friend.

item.title: Gurt - Radio Awesome
item.description: It"s back for yet another week! Enjoy the soothing sounds of stuff! I"d think of a better write-up but it"s 3AM and my brain is made of some kind of goo, much like it will be during the show!
